mapper.insert: insert into reviewboard( review_writer, review_category, review_lat, review_lng, review_title, review_content, review_realAddress, review_theme ) values( #{review_writer}, #{review_category}, #{review_lat}, #{review_lng}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_realAddress}, #{review_theme} )

select max(REVIEW_NO) as REVIEW_NO from REVIEWBOARD where REVIEW_WRITER = #{review_writer}
insert into review_upload( review_filename, review_filepath, review_uuid, review_no, review_writer ) values( #{review_filename}, #{review_filepath}, #{review_uuid}, #{review_no}, #{review_writer} )
